tree.name: DeMar DeRozan
tree.tradeDescription: 3-team sign-and-trade: SAC sent Harrison Barnes + 2031 1st swap to SAS; SAC sent cash, Chris Duarte, 2025 2nd (SAC own, became Zikarsky), and 2028 2nd (SAC own) to CHI; CHI sent DeRozan to SAC
tree.note: 6-time All-Star, originally drafted 9th overall by Toronto in 2009

assetsGivenUp.name: Harrison Barnes
assetsGivenUp.tradeDescription: Kings traded Justin Jackson and Zach Randolph to Mavericks for Harrison Barnes
assetsGivenUp.note: Originally drafted 7th overall by Golden State in 2012

assetsGivenUp.name: Zach Randolph
assetsGivenUp.note: Veteran forward signed as free agent

assetsGivenUp.name: 2031 1st Round Pick Swap
assetsGivenUp.note: Sacramento's 2031 first round pick swap rights, sent to SAS

assetsGivenUp.name: Chris Duarte
assetsGivenUp.tradeDescription: Kings traded 2028 2nd (DAL own) and 2030 2nd (SAC own) to Pacers for Chris Duarte
assetsGivenUp.note: Originally drafted 13th overall by Indiana in 2021

assetsGivenUp.name: 2028 2nd Round Pick (DAL)
assetsGivenUp.note: Originally acquired from Dallas in Jaden Hardy trade

assetsGivenUp.name: 2025 2nd Round Pick (SAC)
assetsGivenUp.note: Sacramento's own 2nd round pick, sent to CHI

assetsGivenUp.name: 2028 2nd Round Pick (SAC)
assetsGivenUp.note: Sacramento's own 2nd round pick, sent to CHI
